title: Drawing, "Ten Octagons with Mythological Figures", 1802
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: inscribed: vesta e cibele; minerva madre delle sienze e arti; cerere e Bacco picolo; diana endimione; giove giunone picolo; marte venere; netuno e Anfitrite; pluto e proserpina; apollo e dafne; marte venere; vulcano; apollo.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Ten octagons with Vesta, Cibele, Minerva, Bacus, Diana, Endimione, Jove, Giunone, Venus, Neptune, Pluto, Proserpina, Apollo, Daphne, Venus. Tondo with Madonna, infant and St. John; blessed family.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Ten Octagons with Mythological Figures", 1802. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1925.
